title: Doing business in Japan
creator_contributor_role: Business Council for International Understanding, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Japan - Social life and customs

description: This film deals with the difficulties and complications that arise, in international business relationships, as a result of the cultural barriers that exist. The film is designed to be a teaching/training tool that can be used as the focus of a discussion or course of study.
